**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 1.1 **Usage** held in 2 hands **Bulk** L --- Sought after by many unscrupulous [bards](/Classes.aspx?ID=3), this instrument is surprisingly light and easy to carry, but also empowered with a number of spells carefully selected to help with fooling others or making a hasty retreat. While playing the mandolin, you gain a +1 item bonus to [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) and [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) checks. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Trickster's Mandolin **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 1.1 **Price** 90 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **Cantrip** [_prestidigitation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=229)
  • **1st** [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159), [_item facade_](/Spells.aspx?ID=166), [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356)
Trickster's Mandolin (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 1.1 **Price** 460 gp **Bulk** L ---
  • **2nd** [_illusory creature_](/Spells.aspx?ID=158), _illusory disguise_, [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), [_mirror image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=197)
  • **3rd** _illusory disguise_, [_phantom prison_](/Spells.aspx?ID=969), [_sculpt sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=714)
Trickster's Mandolin (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 137 1.1 **Price** 1,900 gp **Bulk** L --- The item bonuses are +2.
  • **4th** [_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), _invisibility_, [_veil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=355)
  • **5th** _hallucination_, [_illusory scene_](/Spells.aspx?ID=161), _veil_
name: Trickster's Mandolin (Major)
